mapper.select: select aw.id,p.name AS pname ,si.ipath AS imgPath ,imgLink ,aw.top_pic ,aw.sort ,aw.sku ,pr.activityprice,pr.price,pr.marketprice,pr.activitytype from sys_app_homead_ware aw LEFT JOIN p_pro_rules pr ON aw.sku = pr.sku LEFT JOIN p_product p ON pr.pid = p.id left join p_sku_images si on pr.colorid = si.colorid and si.ismain = 1 where aw.state = 1 and aw.ad_id = #{ad_id} order by aw.sort asc
